name: Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. OFFICE OF DISTRICT ATTORNEY, PHILADELPHIA and Office of Attorney General, Commonwealth of PA and Hon. Judge Sheila Woods-Skipper and Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Vurimindi v. Office of District Attorney

judges: Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
parties: Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. OFFICE OF DISTRICT ATTORNEY, PHILADELPHIA and Office of Attorney General, Commonwealth of PA and Hon. Judge Sheila Woods-Skipper and Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED. The Prothonota-ry is DIRECTED to strike the name of the jurist from the caption.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
129 A.3d 1235
Vamsidhar VURIMINDI, Petitioner v. OFFICE OF DISTRICT ATTORNEY, PHILADELPHIA and Office of Attorney General, Commonwealth of PA and Hon. Judge Sheila Woods-Skipper and Court of Common Pleas, Philadelphia, Respondents.
No. 141 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 24, 2015.
